original_title: IMF second review of Sri Lanka’s bailout package begins today
original_body_lines: The second review of the Extended Fund Facility (EFF) program of International Monetary Fund (IMF) kicks off today (March 07) with an opening meeting scheduled with President Ranil Wickremesinghe.

Taking to his X handle (formerly Twitter), the Finance State Minister Shehan Semasinghe said this marks a crucial milestone in the ongoing efforts by the government to enhance stability and economic growth.
